# isSymbolicLink

**Instance Property**

A boolean that indicates whether the file wrapper object is a symbolic-link file wrapper.

## Declaration

```swift
var isSymbolicLink: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the file wrapper object is a symbolic-link file wrapper, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.

Invocations of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileWrapper/read(from:options:)] may change the value contained by this property, if the type of the file on disk has changed.

## Querying File Wrappers

- **isRegularFile**: This property contains a boolean value that indicates whether the file wrapper object is a regular-file.
- **isDirectory**: This property contains a boolean value indicating whether the file wrapper is a directory file wrapper.
